participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop.

participant_2.name: Jake

participant_2.background: i work my parents farms. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i'm an electrician.
